alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Erath, eastern Eastland and north central Comanche Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Lake Leon, or 11 miles south of Ranger, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ranger, Gorman, Lake Leon, Staff, Kokomo, Rucker, Desdemona, and Highland. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 349 and 350. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
